tooltip.relics.static_rifle.leveling: Here's a substantial rifle that unleashes energetic bursts, yet it does no harm to its wielder. It's not just safe; it's downright captivating with its sheer power. Ah, I do appreciate such intriguing gadgets!
tooltip.relics.static_rifle.ability.bzzs: The Static Rifle zaps foes with a burst of electrifying energy, jumping to the next target with each hit. Subsequent hits deal half the damage. At max level, unleash four extra weak spheres for a dazzling display of controlled chaos. Master the electrifying dance of the upgraded Static Rifle!
tooltip.relics.static_rifle.ability.forc: The Static Rifle compresses energy, conjuring a protective forcefield. Within its confines, enemies fall prey to the Static effect. Unleash a shocking defense strategy with the Static Rifle's electrifying forcefield!
tooltip.relics.morphcook.leveling: The Morph-cook, a tiny culinary maestro, transforms everyday objects into delightful dishes. Its unique skill? Turning any type of flesh and meat into a nutritious treat for your body. Get ready for a culinary journey where the ordinary becomes extraordinary!
tooltip.relics.morphcook.ability.passive: The Morph-cook works its magic, morphing raw objects into deliciously cooked creations. Similar to the efficiency of a Smoker, amplify the process by adding more Morph-cooks. Transform your kitchen into a culinary powerhouse with this morphing duo!
tooltip.relics.morphcook.ability.fleshfe: The Morph-cook scavenges a bit of flesh from nearby mobs, crafting a health-friendly feast to nourish you. Savor the unique blend of convenience and sustenance with this culinary marvel!
tooltip.relics.whirlwind_spear.leveling: Dive into the depths with the Whirlwind Spear – a mystical weapon plucked from the ocean's abyss. Channeling the essence of the deep seas, this spear invites you to wield the very currents that shape its existence. Become a maritime force as you navigate the ebb and flow of combat, embodying the enigmatic prowess of Neptune himself.
tooltip.relics.whirlwind_spear.ability.w: The Whirlwind Spear summons a raging sea storm, drawing foes into its turbulent embrace. Within its watery grasp, enemies are slowly submerged, facing a relentless, drowning fate. Harness the elemental might of the spear and watch as the sea itself becomes a formidable weapon against your adversaries.
tooltip.relics.whirlwind_spear.ability.b: The Whirlwind Spear envelops its wielder in an impenetrable bubble, rendering them invulnerable and steadfast. Locked in this protective embrace, the player becomes an unyielding force, impervious to attacks and unmovable against the tide of opposition. Embrace the security of the watery shield with the Whirlwind Spear!
tooltip.relics.steam_boiler.leveling: Introducing the Steam Boiler, a compact marvel forged from resilient copper. This small yet powerful boiler harnesses the might of steam, promising efficiency and reliability. Let this metal wonder fuel your ventures with its sturdy design and unwavering performance.
tooltip.relics.steam_boiler.ability.comf: Experience the soothing embrace of comfort as the Steam Boiler releases a steady stream of boiling steam. Bask in the warmth, and feel your vitality rejuvenate at an accelerated pace. Let the healing power of the steam guide you, turning the Steam Boiler into your own personal oasis of faster regeneration.
tooltip.relics.steam_boiler.ability.emer: Feel the temperature surge within the Boiler as it reaches a boiling crescendo. The explosive release of steam propels the player forward, providing a dynamic burst of momentum. Embrace the controlled chaos and let the Steam Boiler elevate your movement with a thrilling burst of propelled energy.
tooltip.relics.truefire_burner.leveling: Embark on a mystic adventure with the Soulfire Burner—an ever-burning enigma fueled by the truths it holds. Your choices intertwine with its resilient flame, shaping your path through a captivating dance of destiny and desire.
tooltip.relics.truefire_burner.ability.e: The Truefire Burner propels players into the sky with a burst of fiery energy, leaving a scorching imprint upon the ground below.
tooltip.relics.truefire_burner.ability.f: The Truefire Burner unleashes its fiery onslaught upon nearby entities, dealing devastating damage that leaves those touched on the brink of oblivion. Beware, for the flames it imparts spell near-certain demise for those unfortunate enough to be caught in its path.
